marklogic.body: For the past couple of weeks I had been using Clearasil face wash and Spot cream to keep my face fresh and Spot free, but I later discovered after a week afetr visiting the doctor that I had an allergic reaction from it and had to be on medicine. A lot of people were telling me to try the Bioderma but unfortunately I can't get a hold of it and would really love to try it out. My current favourite skincare product (if it countd as one) is Simple make up wipes I got from the pharmacy. It has no alcohol or bad bacteria in it and it hydrates my skin really well and hasn't broken me out like other make up wipes. I love your channel and hopefully the Bioderma (if you pick me!) works well on me like it does on you. xx
